questions.question: With reference to the system of checks and balances in the constitution, which of the following statements is correct?
choices: It enables the legislature to hold more power over the executive and the judiciary
It is antithetical to the concept of division of powers in a political structure
Article 13 is an example of the system of checks and balances in India.
Single party majority in the parliament strengthens the system of checks and balances.

questions.question: Which of the following features of constitution of India has been borrowed from Government of India Act,1935?
choices: Fundamental rights, independence of judiciary, judicial review, impeachment of the president
Federal Scheme, Office of governor, Judiciary, Public Service Commissions, Emergency provisions
Concurrent List, freedom of trade, commerce and inter-course, and joint sitting of the two Houses of Parliament.
Parliamentary government, Rule of Law, legislative procedure, single citizenship, cabinet system, prerogative writs.

choices: It promotes the nationalization of all means of production in the country.
It promotes the establishment of the egalitarian social order through the rule of law.
It means equal distribution of wealth among the individual members of the society.

Indian brand of socialism is called as ‘Democratic Socialism’. Which one of the following options best describe ‘democratic socialism’ of India?
choices: It involves nationalization of all means of production and distribution and abolition of private properties.
It follows the ideals of market economy and pursues the path of globalization towards economic integration of domestic markets.

The executive remains responsible to the legislature.

Indian secularism allows the state-supported religious reform. 3. Indian secularism focuses on both inter and intra religious equality. 4. Under Indian secularism the state cannot aid any religious institution. Which of the statements given above are correct?

choices: The constitution allows for differentiating between people to ensure equity.
The constitution has given more preference to Equality in comparison to liberty

Division of Labor and Functional specialization of tasks

questions.question: The concept of ‘Principled Distance’ is closely related to which among the following?

Resolution of disputes between the Centre and the states.
